roleset.name: curve
roleset.note: QUIRK-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from quirk.01-v)

role.descr: thing quirking at or in response to

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: Here , too , she-2 talked low , [*-2] quirking her head at one or another of theplaces , most often at Izaak 's armchair which [*T*-1]faced her across thelong table .
example.arg: at one or another of the places , most often at Izaak 'sarmchair which [*T*-1] faced her across the long table
